name: laravel-validator-for-js
title: Validator constructor function for easy data validation on both the client and server side.
description: A constructor function for data validation on both the server and client, inspired by the Laravel PHP framework. The API is very similar to that of the Laravel Validator class.
author: David <dtang85@gmail.com>
keywords: A port of the Validator class in the Laravel PHP MVC framework to JavaScript
